MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KY1 area of Kirkcaldy. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:28am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required to our underground electricity network near the Redhouse substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:26am on Monday, 29 March 2021
